summary:
Doesn\'t require Dawnguard 

Contains a lot of stuff, better magic, new summons, improved stones powers, enchanting, perks and bug fixes.
descriptionHtml:
Updated to V2 100% bug free version, fully tested.

I had to reedit the entire mod.

Installation
_____________________________________________________________________

Use the nexus mod manager or extract the files manually on the folder:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data 
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/16738026/better_skyrim_01.esp]You can download the .esp file in the mirror section[/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100438153] Steam Version [/url]
_____________________________________________________________________

Content:

New in 2.1.3: Improved Konahrik\'s Mask Enchantment and a new destruction spell (Triattack).

Belethor sells new weapons, new armor, spell tomes...you should visit him :)

Added spell tomes for powers, and they can be used multiple times per day.

Improved perks/stones: Augmented flames/frost/shock, conjuration, deadly aim, regeneration, Eternal Spirit, Force Without Effort, The Fire Within, Lover stone, warrior stone, mage stone, thief stone.

Added some starting stuff in the chest in Helgen Keep.

Fixed: Using the atronach stone/perk/power now doesn\'t absorb your summons.

Fixed: Custom fit now should work with the office stormcloak armor.

Fixed: Non-hostile animals now are not afected by player cloak spells.

Conjured atronach are more powerfull and regenerate health over time (Potent / Thrall).

Summoned Dragons with scales give you souls if they die near you.

Reanimated creatures (by the player or by enemies) don\'t turn into ash.

Improved cast time of long spells.

Perks augmented flames / frost / shock now work on cloak spells.


Better Followers:
_______________

Now you can take of the annoying invisible bows of the followers!

Slave follower for the quest \"Boethia\'s calling\" or for whatever you want.

_____________________________________________________________

Base enchantments improved.
